players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob, keep an eye on Charlie. I'm Alice."
Charlie: "Alice, thanks. Bob, watch out for any unusual behavior."
Bob: "Bob, Alice confirmed as mafioso. Watch her and Charlie closely."
Bob: "Bob, observed Alice and Diana. Alice confirmed mafioso; Diana's death suspicious."
Charlie: "Bob, keep an eye on Alice; Charlie observed her as mafioso. Diana's death suspicious."
You: "Bob, continue monitoring Alice & Charlie. Stay vigilant."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Alice knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Bob, keep an eye on Charlie. I'm Alice."
Charlie: "Alice, thanks. Bob, watch out for any unusual behavior."
You: "Bob, Alice confirmed as mafioso. Watch her and Charlie closely."
You: "Bob, observed Alice and Diana. Alice confirmed mafioso; Diana's death suspicious."
Charlie: "Bob, keep an eye on Alice; Charlie observed her as mafioso. Diana's death suspicious."
Alice: "Bob, continue monitoring Alice & Charlie. Stay vigilant."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Alice was arrested
